definition: dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
short name for Guiyang 貴陽|贵阳[Gui4 yang2]
to build/to construct/to ram/to hit/Taiwan pr. [zhu2]

sentences.english: The deal was agreed last year and construction is expected to begin soon.
sentences.chinese: 这项输油管道协议去年达成，修筑工程预计很快开工。

sentences.english: Construction work has been started on the new system of railways.
sentences.chinese: 修筑新铁路的系统工程已经开始。

sentences.english: Hadrian's Wall is built across Britannia to keep out the barbarians .
sentences.chinese: 横贯大不列颠的哈德连长城被修筑用来防御野蛮人。

sentences.english: Workers were conscripted into forced labour gangs to build the railways.
sentences.chinese: 工人们被强行征入强迫劳动队去修筑铁路。

sentences.english: To save it, plans have been drawn to build a massive wall around the base of the pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 为了抢救石宝寨，他们打算绕着塔基修筑巨大围堤。

sentences.english: The ventilation system of any building is the perfect hiding place.
sentences.chinese: 任何一所修筑的排风心都是完善的隐匿处。

sentences.english: Israel says Hamas, which will be used to build fortifications.
sentences.chinese: 以色列称，它们将被哈马斯用来修筑防御工事。

sentences.english: West of Peking, the builders struck sticky clay.
sentences.chinese: 在北京西边，修筑者们遇到了粘土。

sentences.english: He has made neat paths and has built a wooden bridge over a pool.
sentences.chinese: 他修筑了一条条整洁的小路，池塘上架了一座小木桥。

sentences.english: East Fen River in the east coast, Ming Chen Li, deputy Zhenguan presided over the building.
sentences.chinese: 东城在汾河东岸，为贞观名臣李副主持修筑。

sentences.english: This route is cut into the eastern side of the second highest mountain range on Earth, the Andes.
sentences.chinese: 这条路是在地球第二高山脉安第斯山的东侧修筑的。

sentences.english: Building roads still involves manual labor.
sentences.chinese: 修筑道路还需要人工劳动。

sentences.english: The road including new roads and the construction of the original multi-column Burma Road.
sentences.chinese: 这条路包括新修筑的列多公路以及原来的缅甸公路。

sentences.english: The city will tear down these buildings to make room for the new highway .
sentences.chinese: 市政当局要拆毁这些建筑物以让出地方修筑新公路。

sentences.english: It touched off a nationwide movement for the recovery of railway rights.
sentences.chinese: 这在全国引起了收复铁路修筑权的运动。

sentences.english: The pavement structure and material are the key techniques for desert highway construction.
sentences.chinese: 路面结构与材料是修筑沙漠公路的关键。
